      Methods in com.vmware.nsx.model that return PacketCaptureRequest.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapamount​(java.lang.Long capamount)
      Define the packet capture amount size.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapcore​(java.lang.Long capcore)
      The CPU core id on Edge node.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapduration​(java.lang.Long capduration)
      Define the packet capture duration time.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapfilesize​(java.lang.Long capfilesize)
      Define the packet capture file size limit.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapmode​(java.lang.String capmode)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.CAPMODE_STANDALONE PacketCaptureRequest.CAPMODE_STREAM Define the capture streaming mode.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCappoint​(java.lang.String cappoint)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VNIC PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VMKNIC PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VMNIC PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VDRPORT PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_DVFILTER PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_LOGICALPORT PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_FCPORT PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VIF PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_PNIC Define the point to capture data.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCaprate​(java.lang.Long caprate)
      Define the rate of packet capture process.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapsnaplen​(java.lang.Long capsnaplen)
      Limit the number of bytes captured from each packet.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapsource​(java.lang.String capsource)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.CAPSOURCE_CLI PacketCaptureRequest.CAPSOURCE_UI This type is used to differenite the incoming request from CLI/UI.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setCapvalue​(java.lang.String capvalue)
      Define the capture value of given capture point.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setDirection​(java.lang.String direction)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_INPUT PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_OUTPUT PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_DUAL Define the capture direction.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setFiltertype​(java.lang.String filtertype)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.FILTERTYPE_PRE PacketCaptureRequest.FILTERTYPE_POST Define the capture filter type.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setNode​(java.lang.String node)
      Define the transport node to capture data.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setNodeIp​(java.lang.String nodeIp)
      Define the transport node to capture data.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setOptions​(PacketCaptureOptionList options)  
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setStreamaddress​(java.lang.String streamaddress)
      Set the stream address to receive the capture packet.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder PacketCaptureRequest.Builder.setStreamport​(java.lang.Long streamport)
      Set the stream port to receive the capture packet.
